content.question: The term “Prague Spring” refers to the

choices.label: impact of the French Revolution on Czech intellectuals
founding of the Republic of Czechoslovakia in 1918
liberation of Czechoslovakia from the Nazis in 1945
reforms by the Czechoslovak government in 1968

content.answer: reforms by the Czechoslovak government in 1968

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
